sentences.sentence: Teachers are both creators of the Utopia and the helpers of undoing cryptograms.
sentences.translation: 教师既是乌托邦的创造者，也应该成为解开现时密码的有力助手；

sentences.sentence: The estimation of the time to break the cryptograms shows that it will take too much time with the aid of available computer technology.
sentences.translation: 对破密时间的估算表明，利用现有计算机技术所需的破密时间极长。
